main.*:
The '''10th Legion''' was one of the three legions in the [[Malaz 14th Army]], which also included the [[8th Legion|8th]] and [[9th Legion]]s.  It was commanded by Fist [[Tene Baralta]] and fielded four thousand recruits.<ref>[[House of Chains]], [[HC/5|Chapter 5]], US SFBC p.237</ref>
